nodes.text: Founding Day was a holiday on the Core World of Alderaan, prior to the planet's destruction in 0 BBY. It was celebrated in memory of the founding of the House of Organa, Alderaan's Human royal family, which could trace its origins back to the colonization of the planet in 27,500 BBY. During Founding Day, fireworks were exhibited.
Founding Day was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a 2008 novel by Karen Miller.
